stepAnswer: The procedure will go well, but the doctors think it will not.|The procedure will not go well, but the doctors think it will.
stepTitle: What is the Type I error in this case?
stepBody: Choose the best answer from the following.
choices: The decision is not to reject $$H_0$$ when, in fact, $$H_0$$ is false.
The decision is to reject $$H_0$$ when $$H_0$$ is true.
The procedure will go well, but the doctors think it will not.|The procedure will not go well, but the doctors think it will.
